languages.text: "Это не..." {n}Хейнрикс с заметным усилием переводит дух и продолжает спокойнее.{/n} "Это не подарок, Лорд-капитан. Это редкое и ценное устройство, которое станет полезным инструментом в руках Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Это не..." {n}Хейнрикс с заметным усилием переводит дух и продолжает спокойнее.{/n} "Это не подарок, Лорд-капитан. Это редкое и ценное устройство, которое станет полезным инструментом в руках Вольного Торговца — тем более новоиспеченного, как вы".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Это не..." {n}Хейнрикс с заметным усилием переводит дух и продолжает спокойнее.{/n} "Это не подарок, Лорд-капитан. Это редкое и ценное устройство, которое станет полезным инструментом в руках Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmy,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmy,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmy,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmy,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这可不是——”{n}海因里希极力不让自己动摇，以更加冷静的口吻开了口。{/n}“这可不是什么‘定情信物’，舰长大人。这是一件极为稀有而珍贵的装置，它将会成为行商浪人有用的工具。”
languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “这可不是——”{n}海因里希极力不让自己动摇，以更加冷静的口吻开了口。{/n}“这可不是什么‘定情信物’，舰长大人。这是一件极为稀有而珍贵的装置，它将会成为行商浪人有用的工具。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡No es...!». {n}Heinrix se contiene a duras penas y sigue, más tranquilo:{/n} «No es una "muestra de afecto", Lord Capitán. Es un dispositivo singular y valiosísimo que será útil para cualquier Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «¡No es...!». {n}Heinrix se contiene a duras penas y sigue, más tranquilo:{/n} «No es una "muestra de afecto", Lord Capitán. Es un dispositivo singular y valiosísimo que será útil para cualquier Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それは…」{n}ハインリックスは身をこわばらせ、さらに穏やかに続けた。{/n}「それは『愛の証』ではないんだ、ロード・キャプテン。それは自由開拓者の手にかかれば、便利な道具となる希少価値の高い装置なのだ」
languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「それは…」{n}ハインリックスは身をこわばらせ、さらに穏やかに続けた。{/n}「それは『愛の証』ではないんだ、ロード・キャプテン。それは自由開拓者の手にかかれば、便利な道具となる希少価値の高い装置なのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas... » {n}commence Heinrix, puis il fait un effort visible pour se ressaisir et poursuit plus calmement.{/n} « Ce n'est pas un "gage d'amour", {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est un appareil rare et précieux qui devrait se révéler extrêmement utile à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas... » {n}commence Heinrix, puis il fait un effort visible pour se ressaisir et poursuit plus calmement.{/n} « Ce n'est pas un "gage d'amour", {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est un appareil rare et précieux qui devrait se révéler extrêmement utile à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist es nicht ..." {n}Heinrix sträubt sich sichtbar dagegen und fährt dann ruhig fort:{/n} "Das ist kein 'Zeichen der Liebe', Lord Captain. Sondern ein seltenes und wertvolles Gerät, das sich in den Händen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} als nützliches Werkzeug erweisen wird."
languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist es nicht ..." {n}Heinrix sträubt sich sichtbar dagegen und fährt dann ruhig fort:{/n} "Das ist kein 'Zeichen der Liebe', Lord Captain. Sondern ein seltenes und wertvolles Gerät, das sich in den Händen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} als nützliches Werkzeug erweisen wird."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmy,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: "Öyle değil..." {n}Heinrix, metanetini yitirmemek için gözle görülür bir çaba sarf edip ardından sakince devam ediyor.{/n} "Bu bir 'aşk simgesi' değil Lord Kaptan. Hür Tacir'in elinde oldukça kullanışlı olacak, nadir ve kıymetli bir cihaz."
languages.original_text: "It's not—" {n}Heinrix steels himself with visible effort and continues more calmly,{/n} "It is not a 'love token,' Lord Captain. It is a rare and valuable device that will be a useful tool in the hands of the Rogue Trader."
